Key Match Events: Mookie Betts hit a home run in the first inning
Will Smith hit a two-run home run in the third inning
Gavin Lux hit a two-run home run in the second inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers were without their starting first baseman and shortstop
The Dodgers had three reserves in the lineup
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers showed their resolve by using eight different pitchers to shut down the Padres’ vaunted offense
The Dodgers, who were bounced from the playoffs in the first round the last two years, winning just one game, now believe the worst is behind them
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers will have $1 billion in free agents on center stage Friday alone with Shohei Ohtani and Yamamoto
